resources.string: Do you want to clear with job history?
Do you want to Continuous Scan?

Welcome! 
 
Please scan Barcode with 'Scan' button. So barcode result is written in Textbox. 
(Push 'Back' button for stopping scan in continuous mode.) 
 
All text is autosaved when you scan or exit. 
 
If you want to clear all data with job history, push 'Clear' button 1~2 seconds.

▶ 1.1.0 
- Added Simple Undo/Redo Function 
 Undo/Redo is Unlimited 
 Push 'Clear' button 1~2 seconds for clearing all data.

▶ 1.1.1 
- Share bug is fixed 
 Fixed bug that values are not sharing via SMS etc. 
- Fixed some text

▶ 1.2.0 
- Applied Zxing 2.2 
- Added Continuous Scan 
 Push 'Back' button for stopping scan. 
- Fixed some text
▶ 1.2.1 \n- Fixed Newline Character Bug \n Fixed bug that all of content in one line when open shared textfile in Windows-based OS
